actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A joint resolution providing for congressional disapproval of the rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to the delay in the effective date of a new arsenic standard.

summary.text: Disapproves the rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to the delay in the effective date of the standard for arsenic in drinking water and declares that such rule shall have no force or effect.

titles.title: A joint resolution providing for congressional disapproval of the rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to the delay in the effective date of a new arsenic standard.
